game.s_dis: Time Shooter is a unique FPS where time moves only when you move, allowing for strategic planning and slow-motion combat inspired by SUPERHOT.
game.l_dis:
Play Time Shooter Unblocked – Plan Your Moves in Slow-Motion Combat

Time Shooter is a first-person shooter game where the action only progresses when you move. This innovative mechanic lets you carefully analyze the battlefield, dodge bullets, and strategically take out enemies while time is nearly frozen when you stand still.

What is Time Shooter?

Time Shooter is a tactical FPS that gives players full control over the flow of time. Inspired by the indie hit SUPERHOT, it emphasizes strategy, timing, and precision as you navigate through levels filled with enemies and projectiles.

How to Play Time Shooter

  • Move to Progress Time: Time only advances when you move, giving you the ability to plan your next action.
  • Shoot Carefully: Aim and fire at enemies while considering their movement and bullet trajectories.
  • Strategize: Take advantage of slow-motion to dodge bullets, reposition, and eliminate threats.
  • Complete Levels: Clear all enemies and reach objectives to progress through stages.
  • Master Timing: Precision and planning are key to surviving each encounter.

Why Play Time Shooter Unblocked?

Play Time Shooter Unblocked online for free, directly in your browser. Experience the thrilling mix of strategy and first-person action without downloads or installations.

Key Features

  • Unique Time Mechanics: Time moves only when you move.
  • Strategic FPS Gameplay: Plan each move to avoid bullets and defeat enemies.
  • Slow-Motion Combat: Observe enemy trajectories and react with precision.
  • Challenging Levels: Progress through increasingly difficult stages.
  • Unblocked Access: Play instantly online on any device.

Master Time, Master the Game!

Time Shooter combines tactical planning with intense first-person action. Use slow-motion to your advantage, outsmart enemies, and complete each level with precision. Are you ready to control time?
